questions.question: What is the name of the blue monster with a long smile?
questions.fact: Huggy Wuggy is the first monster you meet in Poppy Playtime! He's blue and VERY tall.

questions.question: Which animatronic bear is the leader?
questions.fact: Freddy Fazbear is the main animatronic and wears a black top hat and bow tie!

questions.question: What color is Banban?
questions.fact: Banban is red and is the main character of the Garten! He loves to give gifts.

questions.question: Who is the pink spider monster?
questions.fact: Mommy Long Legs is pink and has VERY long arms and legs that can stretch!

questions.question: Which animatronic is a pirate?
questions.fact: Foxy is a pirate fox! He has an eye patch and says 'Yarr!' He lives in Pirate Cove.

questions.question: What is the green dinosaur's name?
questions.fact: Jumbo Josh is a big green dinosaur who is VERY strong!

questions.question: Who is the yellow chicken animatronic?
questions.fact: Chica is a yellow chicken who loves pizza! She carries a cupcake named Mr. Cupcake.

questions.question: What kind of bird is Opila Bird?
questions.fact: Opila Bird looks like a tall ostrich and has two heads - one red and one blue!

levels.name: Character Details
levels.description: What do you know about these characters?

questions.question: What does Huggy Wuggy do in the vents?
questions.fact: Huggy Wuggy crawls through the vents to chase the player - it's super scary!

questions.question: What does Freddy Fazbear wear on his head?
questions.fact: Freddy wears a black top hat and a black bow tie. He looks fancy!

questions.question: Where do you find the Garten characters?
questions.fact: The Garten is an underground kindergarten where the mascots used to teach kids!

questions.question: What color is Bonnie the Bunny?
questions.fact: Bonnie is a purple bunny who plays the guitar! He's usually the first to move at night.

questions.question: What does Mommy Long Legs like to play?
questions.fact: Mommy Long Legs LOVES games! But she gets very angry if you don't follow the rules.

questions.question: What does Sheriff Toadster look like?
options: A frog with a sheriff hat
questions.fact: Sheriff Toadster is a green frog wearing a sheriff's hat and badge!

questions.question: Where do the FNAF animatronics perform?
questions.fact: Freddy Fazbear's Pizza is a restaurant where kids have birthday parties and the animatronics sing and dance!

questions.question: What toy helps you in Poppy Playtime?
questions.fact: The GrabPack has two hands on long wires that can grab things and solve puzzles!

levels.name: Game Locations
levels.description: Where do these scary things happen?

questions.question: What is the factory called in Poppy Playtime?
questions.fact: Playtime Co. made toys for kids, but something went very wrong and everyone disappeared!

questions.question: What room does Foxy stay in?
questions.fact: Foxy hides behind the curtain in Pirate Cove. If you don't check on him, he'll run to your office!

questions.question: How many floors does the Garten have?
questions.fact: The Garten goes deep underground with many floors, and it gets scarier the deeper you go!

questions.question: What is the musical area in Poppy Playtime called?
questions.fact: Musical Memory is a puzzle room where you have to copy musical patterns to escape!

questions.question: Where do you watch the animatronics move?
questions.fact: You have cameras all over the building so you can see where the animatronics are!

questions.question: What happens when you run out of power in FNAF?
questions.fact: When you run out of power, everything goes dark and Freddy comes to get you!

levels.name: Character Colors
levels.description: What colors are these scary friends?

questions.question: What color is Huggy Wuggy?
questions.fact: Huggy Wuggy is bright blue with a huge smile full of sharp teeth!

questions.question: What color is Foxy the Pirate?
questions.fact: Foxy is a reddish-brown color, like a fox! He's also kind of broken and old-looking.

questions.question: What colors are Opila Bird's two heads?
questions.fact: Opila Bird has TWO heads - one is red and one is blue! That's pretty weird!

questions.question: What color are Mommy Long Legs' arms?
questions.fact: Mommy Long Legs is pink all over, including her super stretchy arms!

questions.question: What is the main color of the Garten building?
questions.fact: The Garten is very colorful like a kindergarten should be - lots of bright colors everywhere!

questions.question: What color eyes does Golden Freddy have?
questions.fact: Golden Freddy is a mysterious golden bear with black eyes that have white pupils. He's very spooky!

questions.question: Why do you go to Poppy Playtime factory?
questions.fact: You get a mysterious letter about the missing workers and go back to investigate what happened!

questions.question: What is your job in Five Nights at Freddy's?
questions.fact: You're the night guard! You have to watch the cameras and keep the animatronics out of your office until 6 AM.

questions.question: Why are you exploring the Garten?
questions.fact: You're looking for your missing child who went to the Garten and never came home!

questions.question: What happens if an animatronic gets in your office?
options: They jumpscare you and it's game over
questions.fact: If they get into your office, they give you a BIG jumpscare and you have to start over!

questions.question: Who is the first boss you fight in Poppy Playtime Chapter 2?
questions.fact: Mommy Long Legs makes you play her games in Chapter 2. If you win, she gets VERY mad!

questions.question: What do the Garten mascots used to do?
questions.fact: The mascots used to be friendly and teach kids! But something went wrong and they became scary.

questions.question: What can Huggy Wuggy's arms do?
questions.fact: Huggy Wuggy has arms that can stretch super far to grab you from far away!

questions.question: What makes Foxy different from other animatronics?
questions.fact: Foxy is the fastest animatronic! He runs down the hallway straight to your office!

questions.question: What can Mommy Long Legs do with her body?
options: Stretch and squeeze through small spaces
questions.fact: Mommy Long Legs can stretch her body through vents and small spaces to chase you!

questions.question: What does Jumbo Josh do if he catches you?
questions.fact: Jumbo Josh is SUPER strong and will crush you with his strength if he catches you!

questions.question: What can Freddy do on Night 5?
questions.fact: On Night 5, Freddy gets more active and can move even when you're looking at him!

questions.question: What does PJ Pug-a-Pillar do?
questions.fact: PJ Pug-a-Pillar is a caterpillar who crawls through vents and can appear from anywhere!

questions.question: How many nights do you have to survive in FNAF 1?
questions.fact: The main game is 5 nights, but there are bonus nights 6 and 7 that are SUPER hard!

questions.question: What year did the first FNAF game come out?
questions.fact: FNAF 1 came out in 2014 and became super popular really fast!

questions.question: What is the name of the hour hand in Poppy Playtime?
questions.fact: DogDay is the leader of the Smiling Critters in Chapter 3! He's a sun-themed dog.

questions.question: How many Garten of Banban games are there?
questions.fact: As of 2024, there are 6 Garten of Banban games, with more possibly coming!

questions.question: What happens if you type '1987' in FNAF?
questions.fact: 1987 is an important year in FNAF lore - it's when the 'Bite of '87' happened!

questions.question: Who made Five Nights at Freddy's?
questions.fact: Scott Cawthon made FNAF all by himself! He made many more FNAF games after the first one.

questions.question: What company made Poppy Playtime?
questions.fact: MOB Games is the company that created Poppy Playtime and releases new chapters!

questions.question: Who made Garten of Banban?
questions.fact: The Euphoric Brothers are the team that made Garten of Banban!

questions.question: What is the name of the main animatronic in Secret of the Mimic?
questions.fact: The Mimic is a dangerous animatronic that can copy voices and behaviors!

questions.question: Who is the main character you play as in FNAF: Security Breach?
questions.fact: Gregory is a kid who gets trapped in the Pizzaplex and needs Glamrock Freddy's help!

questions.question: What does the Mimic do that makes it so scary?
questions.fact: The Mimic can copy the voices and movements of people - that's why it's called the Mimic!

questions.question: Which animatronic helps Gregory in Security Breach?
questions.fact: Glamrock Freddy is the only animatronic who wants to help Gregory escape!

questions.question: What is Cassie looking for in the Secret of the Mimic DLC?
questions.fact: Cassie gets a message from Gregory asking for help, so she goes into the Pizzaplex to find him!

questions.question: What color is the Mimic's endoskeleton?
questions.fact: The Mimic has a silver endoskeleton underneath, making it look creepy and robotic!

questions.question: What is the main character trying to do in Finding Frankie?
questions.fact: Finding Frankie is a horror game show where you compete for a prize, but things go very wrong!

questions.question: Who is Frankie?
questions.fact: Frankie is the creepy host of the game show who watches everything you do!

questions.question: What makes Finding Frankie scary?
questions.fact: The mascots in Finding Frankie aren't friendly - they hunt you through the game show!

questions.question: What color is Frankie the rabbit?
questions.fact: Frankie is a yellow rabbit mascot with a big creepy smile!

questions.question: What do you need to collect in Finding Frankie?
questions.fact: You need to collect coins while avoiding the scary mascots!

questions.question: Where does Finding Frankie take place?
questions.fact: The game takes place in a twisted game show studio with traps and scary mascots!
